text: akasabhumikale arunalukalilayi pataccuntakkiya allahuvan ninnalute nathan; sansayamilla. pinnit avan adhikarapithattilirunn karyannal niyantriccukeantirikkunnu. avanre anuvadam kittiya sesamallate siparsa ceyyunna arumilla. avanan ninnalute nathanaya allahu. atinal avanumatram valippetuka. iteannum ninnal cinticcu manas'silakkunnille
